title: Rush Application
description: Simulate an urgent loan approval cycle with high-touch checking.

steps.title: Applicant priority upload
steps.description: Documents arrive marked 'priority' using accelerated intake agents.
steps.narration: The applicant submits documents flagged for expedited review.

steps.title: AI pre-screen
steps.description: AI inspects compliance and credit fields for anomalies.
steps.narration: AI analysis scores key risk factors before a reviewer opens the file.

steps.title: Reviewer triage
steps.description: Reviewer assigns application to fast lane and notifies approver.
steps.narration: Reviewers confirm the application meets priority guardrails.

steps.title: Approver sign-off
steps.description: Approver approves with conditions aligned to expedited funding.
steps.narration: Approver signs off and schedules drawdown for the next business day.
